dependencies.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.
dependencies.name: py-ipython

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
CryoDRGN is a neural network based algorithm for heterogeneous cryo-EM
reconstruction. In particular, the method models a continuous
distribution over 3D structures by using a neural network based
representation for the volume
dependent_to.name: cryodrgn

dependent_to.description: ArcGIS API for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-arcgis

dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
dependent_to.name: py-astropy

dependent_to.description:
Adaptive experimentation is the machine-learning guided process of
iteratively exploring a (possibly infinite) parameter space in order to
identify optimal configurations in a resource-efficient manner. Ax
currently supports Bayesian optimization and bandit optimization as
exploration strategies. Bayesian optimization in Ax is powered by
BoTorch, a modern library for Bayesian optimization research built on
PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-ax-platform

dependent_to.description:
Interactive plotting for the Jupyter notebook, using d3.js and
ipywidgets.
dependent_to.name: py-bqplot

dependent_to.description: A set of python tools for reading, writing and viewing Cinema databases
dependent_to.name: py-cinemasci

dependent_to.description:
Productivity Tools for Plotly + Pandas. This library binds the power of
plotly with the flexibility of pandas for easy plotting.
dependent_to.name: py-cufflinks

dependent_to.description: Interactive Canvas in Jupyter.
dependent_to.name: py-ipycanvas

dependent_to.description: A custom widget for returning mouse and keyboard events to Python.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyevents

dependent_to.description:
Python file chooser widget for use in Jupyter/IPython in conjunction
with ipywidgets.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyfilechooser

dependent_to.description: A Jupyter widget for dynamic Leaflet maps.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyleaflet

dependent_to.description: Matplotlib Jupyter Extension.
dependent_to.name: py-ipympl

dependent_to.description: A Tree Widget using jsTree.
dependent_to.name: py-ipytree

dependent_to.description: ipywidget for vtkRenderWindow.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyvtk-simple

dependent_to.description: Jupyter widgets base for Vue libraries.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyvue

dependent_to.description: Jupyter metapackage. Install all the Jupyter components in one go.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter widget to interactively view molecular structures and
trajectories.
dependent_to.name: py-nglview

dependent_to.description: Python visualization tools for openPMD files
dependent_to.name: py-openpmd-viewer

dependent_to.description:
A way to write reusable components in a React-like way, to make Python-
based UI's using the ipywidgets ecosystem (ipywidgets, ipyvolume,
bqplot, threejs, leaflet, ipyvuetify, ...).
dependent_to.name: py-reacton

dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialist

dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.
dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo

dependent_to.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter
dependent_to.name: py-tqdm

dependent_to.description:
Volumetric Data Analysis yt is a python package for analyzing and
visualizing volumetric, multi-resolution data from astrophysical
simulations, radio telescopes, and a burgeoning interdisciplinary
community.
dependent_to.name: py-yt

description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook
name: py-ipywidgets

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
